verses.verse: <S%H310>After<s%> <S%H3651>this<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H7043>cursed<s%> his <S%H3117>day.<s%>
And <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>spoke,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
Let the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> wherein I was <S%H3205>born,<s%> and the <S%H3915>night<s%> in which it was <S%H559>said,<s%> There is a <S%H1397>man<s%> child <S%H2029>conceived.<s%>
Let that <S%H3117>day<s%> be <S%H2822>darkness;<s%> let not <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H1875>regard<s%> it from <S%H4605>above,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> let the <S%H5105>light<s%> <S%H3313>shine<s%> on it.

Let <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death<s%> <S%H1351>stain<s%> it; let a <S%H6053>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> on it; let the <S%H3650>blackness<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H1204>terrify<s%> it.

As for that <S%H3915>night,<s%> let <S%H652>darkness<s%> <S%H3947>seize<s%> on it; let it not be <S%H2302>joined<s%> to the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>year,<s%> let it not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3391>months.<s%>
<S%H2009>See,<s%> let that <S%H3915>night<s%> be <S%H1565>solitary,<s%> let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H7445>joyful<s%> voice <S%H935>come<s%> therein.
Let them <S%H5344>curse<s%> it that <S%H779>curse<s%> the <S%H3117>day,<s%> who are <S%H6264>ready<s%> to <S%H5782>raise<s%> up their <S%H3882>mourning.<s%>

Let the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H5399>twilight<s%> thereof be <S%H2821>dark;<s%> let it <S%H6960>look<s%> for <S%H216>light,<s%> but have <S%H369>none;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> let it <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6079>dawning<s%> of the <S%H7837>day:<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> it <S%H5462>shut<s%> not up the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of my mother's <S%H990>womb,<s%> nor <S%H5641>hid<s%> <S%H5999>sorrow<s%> from my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
<S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> I not from the <S%H7358>womb?<s%> why did I not <S%H1478>give<s%> up the <S%H1478>ghost<s%> when I <S%H3318>came<s%> out of the <S%H990>belly?<s%>
<S%H4069>Why<s%> did the <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H6923>prevent<s%> me? or <S%H4069>why<s%> the <S%H7699>breasts<s%> that I should <S%H3243>suck?<s%>
For <S%H6258>now<s%> should I have <S%H7901>lain<s%> still and been <S%H8252>quiet,<s%> I should have <S%H3462>slept:<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> had I been at <S%H5117>rest,<s%>
With <S%H4428>kings<s%> and <S%H3289>counsellors<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> which <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H2723>desolate<s%> <S%H2723>places<s%> for themselves;
<S%H176>Or<s%> with <S%H8269>princes<s%> that had <S%H2091>gold,<s%> who <S%H4390>filled<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H3701>silver:<s%>
<S%H176>Or<s%> as an <S%H2934>hidden<s%> <S%H5309>untimely<s%> <S%H5309>birth<s%> I had not <S%H1961>been;<s%> as <S%H5768>infants<s%> which <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H216>light.<s%>
<S%H8033>There<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2308>cease<s%> from <S%H7267>troubling;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H3019>weary<s%> be at <S%H5117>rest.<s%>
There the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> <S%H7599>rest<s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%> they <S%H8085>hear<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5065>oppressor.<s%>
The <S%H6996>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> are <S%H8033>there;<s%> and the <S%H5650>servant<s%> is <S%H2670>free<s%> from his <S%H113>master.<s%>
<S%H4100>Why<s%> is <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> to him that is in <S%H6001>misery,<s%> and <S%H2416>life<s%> to the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> in <S%H5315>soul;<s%>
Which <S%H2442>long<s%> for <S%H4194>death,<s%> but it comes not; and <S%H2658>dig<s%> for it more than for <S%H4301>hid<s%> <S%H4301>treasures;<s%>
Which <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H413>exceedingly,<s%> <S%H1524><s%> and are <S%H7797>glad,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they can <S%H4672>find<s%> the <S%H6913>grave?<s%>
Why is light given to a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H5641>hid,<s%> and whom <S%H433>God<s%> has <S%H5526>hedged<s%> in?
For my <S%H585>sighing<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> I <S%H3899>eat,<s%> and my <S%H7581>roarings<s%> are <S%H5413>poured<s%> out like the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
For the thing which I greatly <S%H6342>feared<s%> is <S%H857>come<s%> on me, and that <S%H834>which<s%> I was <S%H3025>afraid<s%> of is <S%H935>come<s%> to me.
I was not in <S%H7951>safety,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> had I <S%H8252>rest,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> was I <S%H5117>quiet;<s%> yet <S%H7267>trouble<s%> <S%H935>came.<s%>
